mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md_chapter (id, course_id, name) VALUES (NULL, #{courseId}, #{name})
mapper.update: UPDATE md_chapter SET name=#{name} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md_article (id, chapter_id, content, catalogue, creator, create_time, last_modified_time, last_modified_user, read_num) VALUES (NULL, #{chapterId}, #{content},#{catalogue}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{lastModifiedUser}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE md_article SET read_num=#{readNum} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT md_article.id AS article_id, md_article.content, md_article.catalogue, md_article.read_num, md_chapter.id AS chapter_id, md_chapter.name AS chapter_name, md_course.id AS course_id FROM md_article INNER JOIN md_chapter on md_article.chapter_id=md_chapter.id INNER JOIN md_course on md_chapter.course_id=md_course.id WHERE md_chapter.id=#{chapterId}
